class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 26 - July 30, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: A comparative study of political, economic, and organizational dynamics of health care institutions in the United States and Britain through seminars, site visits, and a survey research project in London, England.
